message:
errors: alter ERR_HTTP2_PSEUDOHEADER_NOT_ALLOWED

changes the base instance for ERR_HTTP2_PSEUDOHEADER_NOT_ALLOWED
from Error to TypeError as a more accurate representation
of the error..
